channel.title: Save file just past Central Complex
channel.description:
[quote] I'm at the part where i ran for Big Blue. Then climbed up the square thingy.
Now that i'm ontop i can't manage to do /ANYTHING/ on the panel. The red marker isn't appearing. I rammed all my keys, LMB/RMB and it shot a lucky shot and killed Big Blue. Now i read that i need to hit the electricity pole and two walls more aswell.
Now that i can't aim for at all, how am i going to proceed? Could anyone give me a save file from the next part? It's at the Central Complex. Couldn't didn't gave me any.
Please help me. [/quote] I would like a save file so i could get past my bug and keep on playing. I thank everyone who is willing to lend me a hand here.

item.title: Save file just past Central Complex
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
[COLOR=‘Red’]Please don’t post issues with Black Mesa in this section. Also, you have a thread for this.

Read full topic
item.source: Save file just past Central Complex

item.title: Save file just past Central Complex
item.dc:creator: Tomboeg
item.description:
I’m at the part where i ran for Big Blue.
Then climbed up the square thingy.

Now that i’m ontop i can’t manage to do /ANYTHING/ on the panel.
The red marker isn’t appearing.
I rammed all my keys, LMB/RMB and it shot a lucky shot and killed Big Blue.
Now i read that i need to hit the electricity pole and two walls more aswell.

Now that i can’t aim for at all, how am i going to proceed?
Could anyone give me a save file from the next part?
It’s at the Central Complex.
Couldn’t didn’t gave me any.

Please help me.

I would like a save file so i could get past my bug and keep on playing.
I thank everyone who is willing to lend me a hand here.

Read full topic
item.source: Save file just past Central Complex
